## `brand.yml`

```yaml
colors:
  blue: "#0085c3"
  gray: "#aaaaaa"
  white: "#FFFFFF"
  green: "#7ab800"
  yellow: "#f2af00"
  orange: "#ff7700"
  red: "#dc5034"
  red-dark: "#ce1126"
  purple: "#6e2585"
  teal: "#71c6c1"
  periwinkle: "#5482ab"
  aqua: "#009bbb"
  gray-dark: "#444444"
  gray-light: "#eeeeee"


primary: $blue
secondary: $gray
light: $gray-light
dark: $gray-dark

font:
  heading:
    - family: Museo for Dell
      weight: 700
    - family: Trebuchet
      weight: 700
  body:
    family: Museo Sans for Dell
    weight: normal
```
:::
